title: CHAMPION MASTERY
body:
dear riot.

today i mastered one of my favourite champs (but not in my top 3), and i was bummed to find that they disappeared off my profile. i understand that it's an "in progress" window.. (only after) but i wish that there were a way to parade your favourite champs around, more than just the 3 that you have to grind with to climb the ranked ladder

replies.body: you can sort champions by mastery in the champions tab. that's the best you can do atm. I know it doesn't show them off to everyone else, but at least you can look at them.
